column6:
While the rest of the team puts flights and tights on hold for a deserved night off, Night Thrasher decides to do a little solo work. But while he might be prepared for heavily-armed thugs and even a heated encounter with his former flame, Silhouette, can he handle coming face-to-face with his first and greatest adversary? Enter: Midnight's Fire! ,2008,1
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Marte Gracia | writer:Kevin Grevioux | penciller (cover):Nic Klein | artist:Jon Malin | inker:Juan Vlasco
